= Q: How to get the locations of agents at time t? =

{{{
  sim.runSimulationTo(t);
  for (SimAgent agent : sim.getAgents()) {
    IVector location = agent.getPhysicalLocation().getLocation();
    System.out.println(agent.getSimAgentId() + " @ " + location.toCartesianVector().getY() + ", " + location.toCartesianVector().getX());
  }
}}}


= Q: How to get the list of agents on a segment at time t? =
{{{
  sim.runSimulationTo(t);
  sim.getAgents(segment.getId());
}}}
